CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 25, 1950, pg. 5 reads: "Soho Solicitors Have Party - More than thirty of the sixty-two Community Chest solicitors of Soho neighborhood spent a most enjoyable evening at a "Treasure Island" party, held at Soho Community House last Friday night. The highlight of the evening was the opening of the Treasure Chest, which contained a bag of gold (chocolate dollars covered in gold paper) and a note showing the results of the work done by the sixty-two Chest volunteers.  Each of the volunteers again received a plant as a memento of their efforts and experience in drive this year. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group of Community Chest volunteers and children, some wearing paper crowns and hats, gathered around diamond patterned trunk during Treasure Island party, Soho Community House
